English: We...we lost.

Okay, I promise we won't scare any more humans!
Please forgive us!
Chinese:
知道了知道了。
我和你約好往後再也不會對人類出手，
所以放過我吧！
Korean:
알았어 알았어,
앞으로는 절대 인간한테 손 안 대겠다고 약속할게
그러니까 용서해줘!
German:
Also gut, ich verspreche, dass wir Menschen
keine Angst mehr einjagen. Wir bitten um
Vergebung!

English: Really. Please believe us.

Believe Dracmon.
Scare Dracmon.
Chinese:
相信德古獸。
威脅德古獸。

English:
Hmph, it was just supposed to be a joke. I didn't
think it would turn into such a disaster...
Chinese:
呼……
不過是一時興起，真是倒霉啊……
Korean:
후이이……
조금 호기심에 한 거였는데
엄청난 재난이었다고……
German:
Hmpf, es sollte doch ein Witz sein. Ich hätte
nicht gedacht, dass das für uns so schlecht läuft.

English: Hey! What about us?!

You came in search of a ghost story. You found
exactly what you were looking for.
Chinese:
明明是你們自己來找樂子，
還真敢說。
German:
Ihr seid wegen einer Geistergeschichte gekommen.
Und die habt ihr auch gefunden.

English:
As we promised, we won't prank any more humans,
but we'll still do it to Digimon.
Chinese:
我約好不會對人類惡作劇，
但還是會繼續對數碼寶貝惡作劇的。
Korean:
약속대로 인간한테는 장난치지 않을게.
하지만, 디지몬한테는 계속 장난칠 거라니까
German:
Wie versprochen werden wir Menschen keine Streiche
mehr spielen, aber Digimon schon.

English: Don't look so shocked.
Chinese: 別一副受不了的表情嘛。

English: He's a nasty piece of work.
That's right! Now you get it!
Ease off a little? Impossible.
Chinese: 你要我適可而止？這不可能。

English: Bye, humans.
Come on, Bakemon.

If we scare any more humans, you'll destroy our
data from the inside?!
Chinese:
如果我下次再對人類惡作劇，
你要解析我的資料，從內側徹底將我摧毀！？
Korean:
또 인간한테 장난치면
데이터를 해석해서 안쪽부터 부수겠다고!?
German:
Wenn wir noch mehr Menschen Angst einjagen,
zerstörst du unsere Daten von innen?!

English: Please don't!
Come on, Bakemon! Let's get out of here!
German: Komm schon, Bakemon! Nichts wie weg hier!

English: I bet his soul would have tasted great...
Chinese:
來救人那傢伙的魂魄，
看起來這麼美味……
Korean:
인간을 도우러 온 녀석의 영혼,
맛있어 보였는데……
German: Ich wette, seine Seele hätte toll geschmeckt ...

English: I can't believe those two...

You really saved us there...
Thanks.
German: Du hast uns wirklich gerettet. Danke.
